name: mosaic ziggyzag square
notes:
this mosaic crochet blanket square features eye-catching zigzags that burst from the center and radiate outward. you'll use overlay mosaic crochet, an easy colorwork technique, to create a clean, graphic design.
  
this 12-inch square makes an easy addition to a blanket, a quick pair for a throw pillow, or a versatile piece for any project you have in mind.
  
the pattern comes with written instructions and a chart, as well as link to a full video tutorial for the square.
  
unique features-
• striking diamond medallion design
• easy colorwork using overlay mosaic crochet
• detailed written pattern with chart and full video
• a strong focal point for blankets or other crochet home decor
  
  
materials needed
• stitch markers
• hook: 6mm (us size j)
• yarn: worsted weight, approx. 150 yards
• gauge: 9 rounds in 4" x 4" square
